course_description: Encompasses the development of data about the health status, knowledge, perceptions, attitudes, motivation, and health practices of a population or community and its socioeconomic environment.The instructor facilitates the student application of assessment methodology to a community project.
prerequisites: This class is opened for BSHEMPH students only.
